bottle.name: Maison Rouge VSOP
bottle.tasting: fruity and smokey, sorta pleasant straight but definitely should mix to get it a little more mellow

bottle.name: Beefeater
bottle.tasting: Tastes great in cocktails as long as it's diluted some, otherwise strong herbal tones

bottle.name: Tanqueray
bottle.tasting: Very strong juniper, extremely dry and the herbs hit you in the face

bottle.name: Pallini Limoncello
bottle.tasting: Chilled on the rocks - Pleasant lemon smell, lemon flavor but sharp bitterness overpowers it, taking small sips of it is ok

bottle.name: Cointreau
bottle.tasting: sharp but with a nice orange taste, mild-strong burn on the way down, quite surprisingly sorta pleasant

bottle.name: Pierre Ferrand's Dry Curacao
bottle.tasting: kind of sharp initially, tastes a little orangey which is good but the spirit feels like a not great vodka

bottle.name: El Dorado 8
bottle.tasting: Very dry and a little smokey, burns a good bit but not terribly, leaves a strong aftertaste

bottle.name: Flor de Cana 7
bottle.tasting: very strong ethanol flavor, sickly sweetness

bottle.name: El Dorado 3
bottle.tasting: Slightly mellower taste than the 8 year version actually, still sharp and dry, doesn't leave as strong an aftertaste

bottle.name: Plantation 3 Star
bottle.tasting: slight burn on the mouth that lingers into some spicyness, rum taste =\

bottle.name: Glenlivit 12
bottle.tasting: Smokey, slight burn on the throat, little harsh but not bad

bottle.name: Highland Park 12
bottle.tasting: very smokey, lingering aftertaste, acquired taste but worth it

bottle.name: Milagro Silver
bottle.tasting: Dry, burns on the way down, bitter taste

bottle.name: Russian Standard Platinum
bottle.tasting: tastes like nothing, slight burn on the way down, short lingering burning

bottle.name: Sobieski
bottle.tasting: Tastes like nothing, burns the lips and on the way down but in the mouth is actually not bad at all

bottle.name: Buffalo Trace
bottle.tasting: spicyness when it hits your tongue, burns on the way down, sickly aftertaste, I don't think I like bourbon
